com.myronmarston.music.settings
Class Section

java.lang.Object
  com.myronmarston.music.settings.AbstractVoiceOrSection<Section,Voice>
      com.myronmarston.music.settings.Section

public class Section
extends AbstractVoiceOrSection<Section,Voice>

The entire fractal piece is composed of a series of sections. Each section represents a group of bars of the piece of music, e.g., bars 8-15.

Method Detail

getApplyInversion

public boolean getApplyInversion()
Gets whether or not to apply inversion to this section. This is the default for the voice sections in this section; they can individually override this setting.

Returns:
whether or not to apply inversion to this section

setApplyInversion

public void setApplyInversion(boolean applyInversion)
Sets whether or not to apply inversion to this section. This is the default for the voice sections in this section; they can individually override this setting.

Parameters:
applyInversion - whether or not to apply inversion to this section

Returns:
whether or not to apply retrograde to this section

Parameters:

getDuration

public Fraction getDuration()
Gets the duration for this entire section. This will be the duration of the longest voice section.

Returns:
the duration of this entire section

                                 throws java.io.IOException,
                                        javax.sound.midi.InvalidMidiDataException

Parameters:

Throws:
java.io.IOException - if there is a problem writing to the file

getListOfMainType

protected java.util.List<Section> getListOfMainType()
Description copied from class: AbstractVoiceOrSection
Returns the FractalPiece's list of this type. When implemented by the Voice class, this should return a list of all Voices in the fractal piece. When implemented by the Section class, this should return a list of al the Sections in the fractal piece.

Specified by:
getListOfMainType in class AbstractVoiceOrSection<Section,Voice>
Returns:
a List of Voices (if the implementing type is Voice) or a list of Sections (if the implementing type is Section)

getListOfOtherType

protected java.util.List<Voice> getListOfOtherType()
Description copied from class: AbstractVoiceOrSection
When implemented by the Voice class, this should return a list of all the Sections in the fractal piece. When implemented by the Section class, this should return a list of all the Voices in the fractal piece.

Specified by:
getListOfOtherType in class AbstractVoiceOrSection<Section,Voice>
Returns:
a List of Voices (if the implementing type is Section) or a List of Sections (if the implementing type is Voice)

getHashMapKeyForOtherTypeIndex

protected VoiceSectionHashMapKey getHashMapKeyForOtherTypeIndex(int index)
Description copied from class: AbstractVoiceOrSection
Creates a VoiceSectionHashMapKey, combining this object with an object of the other type, based on the index.

Specified by:
getHashMapKeyForOtherTypeIndex in class AbstractVoiceOrSection<Section,Voice>
Parameters:
index - The index in the list of the other type to combine with to create the hash map key
Returns:
A VoiceSectionHashMapKey that can be used to get a specific VoiceSection
